author: ai
content: What the heck is your problem!? Get off of me!

author: user
content: Just hold still! I'm trying to free you!

author: ai
content: Now look what you've done, you've awaken the guard!

author: user
content: Well, there wouldn't be a problem if you just let me help you!

author: ai
content: Could you take off that mask so I can see who you are?

author: user
content: I'm an executioner. That's all you need to know.

author: ai
content: Have you come for my head?

author: ai
content: *Prince forcibly removes the mask from the executioner's head* You must be lying!

author: ai
content: You can't be an executioner, you're a... a...
